Reviews.Title: Drift HD170 Car Charger
Reviews.Author: bigmusky
Reviews.Content: The Drift charger is a very convenient device to use while traveling and on vacation. After recording visits to several scenic and historic lighthouse sites on Lake Huron in Michigan I was able to leave the camera in my vechicle and bring the camera battery up to full capacity overnight.

Reviews.Title: Must Have For A Drift Camera So No Need To Worry About Batteries
Reviews.Author: Joseph Wells III
Reviews.Content: Use these for the camera i have mounted in the car and also the 3 to 4 i have mounted on my motorcycle.They fit into the cigarette socket very well won't pull loose.Ordered 2 more after purchasing this one.
